actions.text: On agreeing to the Brindisi amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Brindisi.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brindisi amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 116-37 to require the GAO to produce a report about the ways in which the U.S. government can promote the deployment of broadband Internet access service, especially to rural areas and areas currently unserved by high-speed broadband access.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 116-37 to require the GAO to produce a report about the ways in which the U.S. government can promote the deployment of broadband Internet access service, especially to rural areas and areas currently unserved by high-speed broadband access.
